message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: A product name must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: A product type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_LBY_MAX_AMOUNT_LARGE
message.locale: The maximum amount should not be entered for liability products.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_BENEFIT_MAX_AMOUNT_ZERO
message.locale: The maximum amount must be entered for benefit products.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_UNIT_COST_FIXED_AMOUNT
message.locale: The estimated cost amount must be entered if the estimated cost is fixed.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_ADJ_FREQUENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: If adjustment is required during processing, the adjustment frequency needs to be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_CERT_FREQUENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: The certification frequency must be entered if certification is required on the product.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_CERT_GRACE_PERIOD_ZERO
message.locale: The grace period must be entered if certification is required on the product.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_ROUNDING_EMPTY
message.locale: The type of rounding to be applied on the product must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_RERATE_FREQUENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: The re-rate frequency must be entered

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_REVIEW_FREQUENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: The review frequency must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_LANGUAGE_EMPTY
message.locale: Language must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_CASE_HOME_PAGE_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The case home page name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_DELIVERY_PATTERN_NAME_EMPTY
message.locale: The delivery pattern name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_DELIVERY_METHOD_EMPTY
message.locale: The delivery method must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_DELIVERY_COVER_PERIOD_EMPTY
message.locale: The delivery cover period type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_DELIVERY_FREQUENCY_EMPTY
message.locale: The delivery frequency must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_DELIVERY_OFFSET_ZERO
message.locale: The delivery offset must be specified.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_BENEFIT_MIN_DEDUCTION_ZERO
message.locale: The minimum deduction amount must be specified for benefit products.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_BENEFIT_MAX_RATE_ZERO
message.locale: The maximum deduction rate must be specified for benefit products.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_BENEFIT_MAX_RATE_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The maximum deduction rate must not be greater than %1n.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_DELIVERY_MAX_PERIOD_NEGATIVE
message.locale: Maximum delivery period cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_DELIVERY_MAX_DEDUCTION_RATE_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The maximum deduction rate cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_BENEFIT_MIN_DEDUCTION_AMOUNT_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The minimum deduction amount cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_BENEFIT_MAX_DEDUCTION_RATE_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The maximum deduction rate cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_BENEFIT_GRACE_PERIOD_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The grace period cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_DATE_LIST_EMPTY
message.locale: The date list must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_BENEFIT_MIN_PAYMENT_AMOUNT_NEGATIVE
message.locale: The minimum payment amount cannot be negative.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_CORRECTION_MAX_AMOUNT_ZERO
message.locale: The maximum amount must be entered for correction products.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_CORRECTION_MIN_DEDUCTION_ZERO
message.locale: The minimum deduction amount must be specified for correction products.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_FV_CORRECTION_MAX_RATE_ZERO
message.locale: The maximum deduction rate must be specified for correction products.

message.name: ERR_PRODUCTASSISTANT_XFV_PAYMENT_CORRECTION_ROLLED_UP_REASSESSMENT
message.locale: Automatic Overpayment Case Processing value '%1s' can only be selected if Use Rolled Up Reassessment Products is set to 'No'.
